actionConfiguration.body:
with CTE_mtd as (
	SELECT DATE_TRUNC('day', view_date) AS timestamp,
    SUM(cast(total_video_views as decimal)) as Total_video_view,
	LAG(SUM(cast(total_video_views as decimal))) OVER (ORDER BY DATE_TRUNC('day', view_date)) AS previous_day,
	SUM(cast(total_video_views as decimal)) - LAG(SUM(cast(total_video_views as decimal)))
    OVER (ORDER BY DATE_TRUNC('day', view_date)) AS difference_previous_day	   
	FROM public."smg_dmp_fb_video_dashboard_unq"
	WHERE view_date >= '{{Start_date.selectedDate}}':: date - interval '1 day'
  AND view_date <= '{{End_date.selectedDate}}':: date
	AND name like {{Domain_select.selectedOptionValue ? Domain_select.selectedOptionValue : "%"}}
	and name is not null
	GROUP BY timestamp)
select CTE_mtd.timestamp,CTE_mtd.difference_previous_day from CTE_mtd	ORDER BY CTE_mtd.timestamp
